xal.tools

Class URLUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.tools.URLUtil

  • public class URLUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    URLUtil is a convenience class of static methods that allow the user to convert between file path and URL specifications.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  URLUtil.FilePathException
      Exception for bad file path specification.
      static class  URLUtil.UrlSpecException
      Exception for bad file path specification.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected URLUtil()
      Creates new URLUtil

      static java.lang.String filePathForUrl(java.net.URL url)
      Convert a URL to a file path
      static java.lang.String filePathForUrlSpec(java.lang.String urlSpec)
      Convert a URL specification to a file path
      static java.lang.String urlSpecForFile(java.io.File file)
      Convert a file to a URL specification
      static java.lang.String urlSpecForFilePath(java.lang.String filePath)
      Convert a file path to a URL specification
